entry.title: Wanna build multi-chain DApps? ⚒ Read Ini's latest piece 🤓
entry.summary:
Wanna build multi-chain DApps? ⚒ Read Ini's latest piece 🤓
Ini Abasi Ekanem: 🔹Chain Abstraction: Connecting Blockchains🔹 Web3 is limited due to difficult onboarding, and complexities like wallet creation, seed phrase management, and language barriers. With Chain Abstraction, the complexity of web3 goes to zero. Read my post: https://open.substack.com/pub/iniabasiekanem/p/chain-abstraction-connecting-blockchains?r=4g7qb&utm_campaign=post&utm_medium=web&showWelcome=true
